sections.heading: and regulations.The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Transportation Innovation Act
sections.text: An eligible county, a city of the metropolitan class, or a city of the primary class may adopt a resolution or an ordinance establishing rules to carry out the act.SourceLaws

39-2824.Rules and regulations.

The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Transportation Innovation Act. An eligible county, a city of the metropolitan class, or a city of the primary class may adopt a resolution or an ordinance establishing rules to carry out the act.

SourceLaws 2016, LB960, ยง 24;Laws 2019, LB583, ยง 18.
